#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int c=0,i,l;
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		l=s.length();
		for(i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='a' ||s[i]=='e' ||s[i]=='i' ||s[i]=='o' ||s[i]=='u' ||s[i]=='A' ||
			s[i]=='E' ||s[i]=='I' ||s[i]=='O' ||s[i]=='U'  )
			c=1;
		}
		if(c==1)
		cout<<"yes"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"no"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
